To make our data available through GBIF and OBIS, we have to upload it through GBIF's Integrated Publishing Toolkit (IPT), which can be the most complex part of data mabilization. The IPT makes a DwC-A file, similar to how Excel make csv files, which is read in by GBIF and OBIS. Here's a video explaining this process and the IPT:
